manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: QC3.0 & PD USB C Charger & Headphone Stand (All in1) COZOO Space Saving Expert !

Two easy installation methods Convenient Charging:keep your desktop tidy and neatly, space saving. Stick with 3M Adhesive Please clean and dry the surface the desk and the stand before installing. Mount with 2 Screws Screws can be installed directly under the table to make it fixed.

Specifications: Material: Fireproof ABS+PC Rated Input: AC 110-240V, 50/60Hz USB Total Output: DC 5V 4.0A (max) Power Cord Length: 6.6ft / 2m Overall Dimensions: 5.1 × 4 × 2.4 inchs / 130 x 102 x 60 mm Headband Plate Dimensions: 2 × 1.2 inchs / 50 x 30 mm each Screw Dimensions: Φ0.16 × 0.6 inch / Φ4 × 15 mm Weight: 5.8oz / 165 g Please Note: The USB ports functions as a USB Charging only, for charging your Phones or Tablets. And it's not as a USB Hub to connect the devices to your computer. Headphone in the picture is not included.

Unique Features: While other headset stands only offer a place to store your headphones, the COZOO Headset Stand is equipped with 3 USB A+C Charging ports, providing easy Charge to your Devices. Fast Charging: 20W PD and 18W QC3.0 4.0 amps output enables the power strip charge 3 devices including your tablets and smartphones simultaneously at full speed, save your time up to 50%. With the smart technology, it can automatically identify the type of device and deliver the suitable current for your device like the original power adapter. Mounting tips: 1.Clean and dry the surface of the desk and the stand before installing. 2.We recommend you wait 24 hours to make the adhesive fully secure so that there is enough adhesive force between the desk and the headphone stand. 3.If hanging weight more than 500g . please install the screws. 4.This adhesive is very sticky with good quality in order to mount steady . If you can't take the adhesive cover off , You can use the hair dryer to heat it and tear it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans up my desk and helps me charge
reviews.reviewText: Love the quality of material and ease of installation. I opted for the screws (since I always have bad luck with adhesive) and it took about 5 minutes with a power drill and a pencil. Charging is as fast as out-of-the-box chargers. The little notches in the arms to hold your dangling cords are a nice touch. And the included cable management clips do exactly what they need to do.If you're getting this, I strongly recommend an 18 inch charging cable. It's just the right length to reach a USB input on the bottom of a headset that is hanging from the arms, and to reach a device that you leave charging on top of your desk. It's short enough that you can just leave it plugged in and forget it.Two small knocks against it (which are clearly shown in the product description so I can't fault the product really). One, the cord that comes out of the back is angled down for some reason, when you're most likely going to be bending it back up to run the cable along the bottom of your desk. Not a big deal since you won't be bending it back and forth, but maybe something to improve in the next iteration. Two, the USB ports only do charging. There is a model that does data transfer, but that only does data transfer (and apparently some super slow charging). It would be great to have a model that does both, even if it required a wall plug and USB plug, but sadly you have to pick one or the other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had this for 3 years and has worked great the entire time, when getting new desk I had to almost break the unit just to get it off the bottom of my old desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well!! great for headphones.
reviews.reviewText: Mounts under my desk perfectly. Great for wireless gaming headsets. Has a nice indicator light that shows when connected and has plenty of ports. Included cables at a bit short but overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent option to hang your headphones and charge devices
reviews.reviewText: In these times when video conferences are the standard, and headsets remain on the desk all the time, this device is ideal.The features that stand out are:1. Autovolt, which works for different countries (in my case 220V).2. Direct connection to the wall outlet.3. I don't know if it's intentional, but in my case the USB charging is fast (for my iPhone, Bose Speaker and iPad.)4. The adhesives are really powerful and you have the alternative of fixing them with small screws.In these times when video conferences are the standard, and headsets remain on the desk all the time, this device is ideal.The features that stand out are:1. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better solution for under the desk headphone hangers.
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the COZOO Headphone Stand with USB Charger .TL;DR │ Skip the other headphone hangers. You'll get more bang for your buck with this.- - - - -Way better than those overpriced headphone hangers. Get this. Not only do you get a better quality hanger, you also get USB devices charger. The price is almost unbelievable when you consider hangers like this costs $16, and you get no cable channels, no USB chargers.WHAT I LIKE │ + │+ Dual headphone hangers.+ Hangers have cable channels for earphones.+ Three USB DC chargers!+ Use double-sided, or a more permanent screw mounting.+ Includes cable hooks for tidier desks.+ Gorgeous packaging.+ Good separation distance between the two headphone.+ InexpensiveWHAT I DON'T LIKE │ × │× Not braided cable.× Non-removable power cable.× Power cable is attached at the bottom (would have been better if it is behind).PACKAGE │ ✓ ✗ │✓ Headphone hanger with pre-applied double-sided tape.✓ Extra double-sided foam tape.✓ Two (2) Screws.✓ Three (3) under-the-desk cable hooks.✓ Printed materials.Note: Depending on your under desk surface and the weight of your headphones, you might need to change the double sided tape if you decide to mount using that option.- - -VERDICT: I highly recommend this product★★★★★ | 5 stars out of 5.Questions? Hit the comments!This review is for the COZOO Headphone Stand with USB Charger .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great headphone holder.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to hold my headphones. It worked! the sticky material that holds it under the desk works great unlike most of the items that I buy that's supposed to stick. I also let it sit under there for the three days that it recommended before I started putting any weight on it. Love it so far and haven't had to drill any holes yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Out of the way yet convenient
reviews.reviewText: I use my headphones all the time yet I did not want them on my desktop. I haven’t had any trouble with the device sticking to my desk. The headphones are convenient for me to reach yet they are still out of the way. This has been a perfect solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adhesive gives at times
reviews.reviewText: Overall I’m really pleased with this product. I attached it to the underside of the lip of my desk, front right. At first the adhesive was amazing. I applied it as instructed. But like once a week or so I’ll sit down to game and look over and it’s hanging/on the floor. I’ve been just putting it back and holding it for a while and it will stay attached, but it’s fallen off about 3 times since I got it around a month or so ago. My headphones aren’t heavy and they’re the only thing I put on it. Don’t even put them on it all the time. Other than the occasional fall, I love it though

I didn't even bother testing out the sticky pad. I just applied it and then put the screws in because I don't trust any sticky pads. This unit works well, has a nice sized arm for my headset and the charging ports are very handy. The power cord does come out of the bottom rather than the back but that's hardly noticeable for me, not a big deal.
